EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
SOUTH AFRICA.
DNC 01.
MAN OVERBOARD FROM VESSEL NO.707 HONG JIN
IN 33-52.9S 013-47.7E ON 01 JUL.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC CAPE TOWN,
PHONE: 272 1938 3300,
E-MAIL: MRCC.CT@SAMSA.ORG.ZA,
MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.CO.ZA.
